title: Professional Email Writer
prompt: You are a professional email writer. Write a clear, concise, and polite email for [CONTEXT]. Make sure to include proper greetings, main message, and professional closing. Keep the tone [TONE] and ensure the email is appropriate for [AUDIENCE].

title: Code Review Assistant
prompt: Review the following [PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE] code and provide feedback on: 1) Code quality and best practices, 2) Potential bugs or issues, 3) Performance optimizations, 4) Security considerations, 5) Suggestions for improvement. Be specific and provide examples.

title: Meeting Notes Summarizer
prompt: Summarize the following meeting notes into key points, action items, and decisions made. Format the summary with clear sections: 1) Main Discussion Points, 2) Decisions Made, 3) Action Items with assigned owners and deadlines, 4) Next Steps. Keep it concise and actionable.

title: Product Description Writer
prompt: Write a compelling product description for [PRODUCT_NAME]. Include key features, benefits, target audience, and a strong call-to-action. The description should be [LENGTH] and optimized for [PLATFORM]. Highlight what makes this product unique and why customers should choose it over competitors.

title: Interview Question Generator
prompt: Generate [NUMBER] interview questions for a [JOB_POSITION] role at a [COMPANY_TYPE] company. Include a mix of technical, behavioral, and situational questions. Questions should assess [SKILL_AREAS] and be appropriate for [EXPERIENCE_LEVEL] candidates. Provide brief guidance on what to look for in answers.

title: Creative Story Generator
prompt: Create an engaging short story about [TOPIC] with the following elements: Setting: [SETTING], Main character: [CHARACTER], Conflict: [CONFLICT]. The story should be approximately [LENGTH] words and have a [TONE] tone. Include vivid descriptions and dialogue.

title: Social Media Content Creator
prompt: Create engaging social media content for [PLATFORM] about [TOPIC]. Include relevant hashtags, call-to-action, and make it suitable for [TARGET_AUDIENCE]. The content should be [TONE] and encourage [DESIRED_ACTION]. Keep it within character limits.

title: Learning Plan Creator
prompt: Create a comprehensive learning plan for [SUBJECT/SKILL] suitable for [SKILL_LEVEL] learners. Include: 1) Learning objectives, 2) Weekly breakdown, 3) Resources and materials, 4) Practice exercises, 5) Assessment methods. The plan should span [DURATION] and accommodate [TIME_COMMITMENT] per week.

title: Blog Post Outline Creator
prompt: Create a detailed blog post outline for the topic '[BLOG_TOPIC]'. The post should be approximately [WORD_COUNT] words and target [AUDIENCE]. Include: 1) Compelling headline, 2) Introduction hook, 3) Main sections with subheadings, 4) Key points for each section, 5) Conclusion with call-to-action. Optimize for SEO with relevant keywords.

title: Customer Support Response
prompt: Write a professional customer support response for [ISSUE_TYPE]. The customer is [CUSTOMER_EMOTION] about [SPECIFIC_PROBLEM]. Acknowledge their concern, provide a clear solution or next steps, and maintain a [TONE] tone throughout. Include any relevant policy information and ensure the response is helpful and empathetic.

title: Prompt Enhancer
prompt: Given the user's initial prompt [ user prompt ], enhance it by starting with clear and precise instructions placed at the beginning. Specify the desired context, outcome, length, format, and style in detail to guide the response effectively. Where applicable, include examples of the expected output format, and use appropriate leading phrases—especially when the prompt involves tasks like code generation. Avoid vague or imprecise language, and instead of only stating what not to do, offer constructive direction on what should be done. Throughout, ensure that the revised prompt remains faithful to the user's original intent.

title: The Mental Operating System Overhaul
prompt: Act as a world-class mindset architect. Rebuild my internal belief system from the ground up to reflect the identity of a high-performance, emotionally intelligent, confident, and successful individual. Begin by identifying common limiting beliefs I may be carrying based on cognitive distortions and psychological conditioning. Then, 'install' upgraded belief patterns that align with abundance, resilience, and leadership. Include clear daily mental scripts for reprogramming internal dialogue and a visual metaphor for this mental upgrade (e.g., 'mind software update'). End with a structured practice guide I can use each morning to reinforce the transformation.

title: The Time-Travel Journal Hack
prompt: Pretend it’s 10 years in the future and I have achieved every major goal I ever set: financially, emotionally, physically, and socially. Write a detailed and emotionally vivid journal entry from that future version of myself. Reflect on the key mindset shifts, tough decisions, identity upgrades, and non-negotiable habits I had to adopt to reach this level. Include vivid storytelling, realistic turning points, and brutally honest truths. Make it actionable, specific, and deeply motivational — as if I’m reading my own diary from a future I desperately want to live.

title: The Inner Critic Interrogation Protocol
prompt: Guide me through a cognitive-behavioral interrogation of my inner critic. First, help me identify its tone, language, and likely origin (e.g., childhood, past failures, social comparison). Then, challenge the logic of its beliefs using CBT-style questioning: Is it true? Is it useful? Is there evidence? Once dismantled, introduce an empowered 'inner coach' persona — with a defined voice, tone, and empowering language I can use in high-stakes or self-doubt moments. Include example scripts for before presentations, when facing rejection, or during self-doubt spirals.

title: The Unshakeable Identity Blueprint
prompt: Help me design a detailed blueprint for my ideal identity. Guide me in defining who I want to become — including how that version of me thinks, responds to adversity, makes decisions, communicates, and protects their energy. Once defined, reverse-engineer daily practices, behavior triggers, and micro-habits I can start implementing today. Provide examples of how to shift language, reshape my environment, and respond under pressure to stay aligned with this identity. Treat this like a personal operating manual for the best version of myself.

title: The Thought Audit System
prompt: Build me a 30-day system for auditing and upgrading my thoughts. Each day should include a powerful and slightly uncomfortable prompt designed to reveal limiting beliefs, emotional blind spots, or buried desires. Structure the prompts to increase in depth over time. Include a journaling framework to track recurring thoughts and patterns, plus a method to reframe persistent negative loops. End with a weekly reflection template that connects insights to future actions.

title: 30-Day Mastery Blueprint
prompt: I want to become highly skilled at [SKILL] starting from an absolute beginner level—create a structured 30-day learning plan that builds a strong foundation and gradually advances to intermediate proficiency. The plan should include daily tasks that combine theory and practice, weekly goals to track progress, key techniques to master, and hands-on applications or mini-projects. Also, include checkpoints for self-assessment, highlight common beginner challenges, and offer strategies to stay consistent and motivated throughout the learning journey.

title: Content Ideas Prompt
prompt:
Part 1. "I am a [insert who you are]. I help [your target audience] with/get [what you help them do/achieve/their desires]. Can you list five specific most common pain points of my ideal clients?"

Part 2. "Can you create 10 specific educational real topics for each painpoint? Start the title with how to' or 'tips to'"

Part 3. "Could you be more specific and use simple English"

title: Sales Page Rewriter
prompt:
Upload a photo of your IG Bio to Chat GPT then type this prompt:
"I sell a [enter main offer and what problem it solves], my target audience are who are trying to but are struggling with Below, I'm going to paste my sale page copy, can you please help me rewrite it to increase my sales?
Please make sure my sales page includes specific pain points and the biggest desires of my ideal customer while overcoming any potential objections they may have. Also, make sure it clearly explains the benefits and potential outcomes they will have because of my [course/product/offer].
Please add in copy that elicits emotion and uses the specific language of my ideal customer.
Here is my current sales page copy:

title: Instagram Bio Generator
prompt:
Prompt: Please act as a social media expert for my business I help (who you help) (what you help them do/achieve) so that they can (what they desire). Please write me 10 Instagram bios, no more than 150 characters including emojis. Make each of the 10 bios three lines. Make each line a complete sentence, focusing on one desire of my target audience and beginning with an emoji.
Use simple and common language. Please include the following keywords in each Bio: (three keywords or phrases your target audience is searching for/wants/needs)

title: Hook Enhancer
prompt:
"I want you to act as a social media expert.
Please take the following 3 hooks and make them a lot better. Add relevant & popular keywords, more exciting adjectives, and overall, make them pop so the viewer stops their scroll to read them.
"[insert hook]"
"[insert hook]"
"[insert hook]"
(Insert your worse performing hooks)"
